response: Founded in 1960 by David Carter RDI CBE,Design 1967, Title 221, Article 4, pages 30 to 34: The Council of Industrial Design Awards and the Duke of Edinburgh's Prize for Elegant Design 1967. http://www.vads.ac.uk/diad/article.php?year=1967&title=221&article=d.221.29 David Carter Associates grew throughout the 1960s and 1970s, becoming DCA Design Consultants in 1975Companies House, details of DCA Design Consultants –  and later renamed itself DCA Design International Ltd in 1986.
